name: BEST WESTERN Premier Hotel International

reviews.text: Only stayed at the Best Western for one night so didn't really have time to see the town.
reviews.title: Good for the price

reviews.text: The hotel is right in the centre & looks up to the castle. The rooms are a good size, clean & comfortable. The only slight problem is the trams, they run all night & are quite loud.
reviews.title: More than adequate

reviews.text: Bar & restaurant prices are very good as is the food.
reviews.title: Absolutely unacceptable

reviews.text: The staff have a good grasp of English which was better than my grasp of Czech.
reviews.title: Decent - Not Bad

description: Ten-story Hotel located in city center, 11 km from Brno Airport.
